privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: Our privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data in compliance with GDPR.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you use our website and services. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable data protection laws.

dataController.title: Data Controller
dataController.content: The data controller responsible for processing your personal data is the owner of this website. If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us using the information provided in the Contact section.

dataCollected.title: Data We Collect
dataCollected.intro: We collect the following types of personal data:

items.email: Email address (when you submit a project inquiry form)
items.projectDetails: Project-related information (budget, timeline, features, business context, etc.)
items.technicalInfo: Technical information automatically collected (IP address, browser type, device information) through our analytics service

purpose.title: Purpose of Processing
purpose.intro: We process your personal data for the following purposes:

items.communication: To communicate with you regarding your project inquiry and provide project estimates
items.projectEstimate: To understand your project requirements and provide personalized recommendations
items.analytics: To analyze website usage and improve our services (using cookieless analytics)

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis
legalBasis.content: We process your personal data based on your explicit consent when you submit the project inquiry form. For analytics purposes, we use cookieless tracking that does not require consent as it uses privacy-preserving server-side hashing.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, or as required by law. Project inquiry data is typically retained for up to 2 years unless you request deletion earlier.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

items.access: Right of access: You can request a copy of the personal data we hold about you
items.rectification: Right to rectification: You can request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
items.erasure: Right to erasure: You can request deletion of your personal data
items.restriction: Right to restriction of processing: You can request that we limit how we use your data
items.dataPortability: Right to data portability: You can request your data in a structured, machine-readable format
items.object: Right to object: You can object to processing of your personal data

yourRights.contact: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at contact@eduardstefan.dev or through the contact form on our website.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.content: We use PostHog for website analytics with cookieless tracking enabled. This means we do not use cookies or local storage for tracking. Instead, we use privacy-preserving server-side hashing that does not store personal data in your browser. This approach complies with GDPR without requiring a cookie consent banner.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Your data is stored securely using industry-standard encryption and access controls.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us through the contact form on our website or by email at contact@eduardstefan.dev. You can also request data access or deletion by emailing us with your request.

footer.text: @ {currentYear} Eduard Sergiu Stefan. Built with Next.js.

home.headline: Built with precision. Designed for growth.
home.tagline: High-quality web experiences built to help your business scale. A direct partnership focusing on maximizing your digital growth.
home.aboutMeDescription: I'm Eduard Stefan, and I build high-quality websites that prioritize high standards and user experience. I focus on creating digital products that convert and deliver real value, helping your business grow digitally. Working one-on-one allows me to obsess over the details that matter most to your business.

tools.label: Technologies
tools.headline: Tools & Technologies
tools.subtitle: The modern stack I use to build fast, scalable web experiences

aboutMe.label: Who I am
aboutMe.headline: About Me
aboutMe.subtitle: Get to know the person behind the code
aboutMe.description: I'm Eduard Stefan, and I've spent over 4 years building high-quality websites that convert and bring real results for clients. I focus on creating experiences that prioritize premium user experience and attention to detail. I prefer a thoughtful, focused approach—working one-on-one allows me to obsess over the details that matter and stay close to the work I love. For me, it's not just about writing code; it's about building something high-quality, intuitive, and genuinely useful for the people on the other side of the screen.

contact.label: Get in touch
contact.headline: Let's work together
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? I'd love to hear about it. Get your offer or reach out directly.

skills.headline: Websites built to be seen, not just exist.
skills.subtitle: Technologies I work with

caseStudies.label: Selected Work
caseStudies.headline: Results that speak for themselves
caseStudies.subtitle: Real projects, real outcomes. See how I've helped businesses overcome challenges and achieve their goals.

testimonials.label: Client Stories
testimonials.headline: Trusted by founders and teams
testimonials.subtitle: Don't take my word for it—hear from the people who've worked with me.

test-1.quote: Eduard transformed our outdated platform into something our users genuinely love. The attention to detail and focus on performance made all the difference. Our conversion rates speak for themselves.

test-2.quote: Working with Eduard was a game-changer for our startup. He delivered our MVP in record time without cutting corners. We secured our seed round largely because of how polished the product was.

test-3.quote: I've worked with many developers, but Eduard stands out. He doesn't just write code—he understands business objectives and builds solutions that drive real results.

test-4.quote: Our e-commerce site was bleeding money due to poor mobile experience. Eduard's optimization work paid for itself within the first month. Highly recommend.

proj-1.name: FinTech Trading Platform
proj-1.description: A full-featured wealth management platform serving thousands of users globally with real-time portfolio tracking and automated investment strategies.
proj-1.challenge: The client needed to scale their legacy trading platform to handle 10x user growth while maintaining sub-second response times.
proj-1.result: Delivered a modern, scalable architecture that reduced page load times by 60% and enabled the platform to handle peak trading volumes effortlessly.

proj-2.name: E-commerce Conversion Boost
proj-2.description: Full redesign and optimization of a mid-market e-commerce store struggling with cart abandonment and slow mobile performance.
proj-2.challenge: High bounce rates on mobile and a 78% cart abandonment rate were costing the business significant revenue.
proj-2.result: Implemented a streamlined checkout flow and optimized mobile experience, resulting in measurable revenue growth within 3 months.

proj-3.name: SaaS Dashboard Rebuild
proj-3.description: Transformed a cluttered analytics dashboard into an intuitive interface that users actually love to use.
proj-3.challenge: Customer support tickets related to UI confusion were overwhelming the team, and user retention was declining.
proj-3.result: Redesigned the entire UX with a focus on clarity and efficiency. Support tickets dropped significantly and user satisfaction scores improved.

proj-4.name: Startup MVP Launch
proj-4.description: Took an idea from napkin sketch to launched product in record time, helping founders validate their market hypothesis.
proj-4.challenge: The founders had limited runway and needed to get to market fast to secure their next funding round.
proj-4.result: Delivered a fully functional MVP in 8 weeks that impressed investors and secured seed funding for the startup.

services.label: My Philosophy
services.headline: No fluff. Just results.
services.subtitle: Direct communication. Faster delivery. Better value.

svc-1.title: High-Quality Web Solutions
svc-1.description: Get a custom solution built with a focus on excellence and your business goals. We move fast, creating a first draft immediately so we can iterate together toward a premium app that scales with you.

svc-7.title: Internationalization & Multi-Language
svc-7.description: Connect with customers worldwide by speaking their language. Your site automatically adapts to every visitor, building trust and helping you expand into new markets effortlessly.

svc-3.title: Lightning-Fast Solutions
svc-3.description: Performance isn't an add-on—it's built-in by default. You get a lightning-fast, optimized setup where speed is a non-negotiable feature, ensuring your visitors never have to wait.

svc-4.title: Digital Growth & Speed
svc-4.description: Get found by the right people and keep them there. I optimize every line of code to ensure your site grows digitally and loads instantly, turning visitors into customers.

svc-5.title: UI/UX Implementation
svc-5.description: Give your users an experience they’ll actually enjoy. I bridge the gap between design and code to ensure your vision results in a site that feels premium and converts.

svc-6.title: Direct Partnership
svc-6.description: Maximize your budget with a direct line of communication. You work one-on-one with me for instant communication and faster decisions that keep your project moving toward success.

howIWork.label: Process
howIWork.headline: How I Work
howIWork.subtitle: A straightforward approach from concept to launch and beyond.

planning.title: Planning
paragraphs: I learn about your project—what you want to build and why—then figure out the best approach. I'll create a clear plan so we both know exactly what we're working toward and when.

development.title: Development
paragraphs: I build your site with attention to detail and quality. You'll get a preview link to see everything as it comes together, so you can give feedback and I can make adjustments as we go.
bulletPoints: Preview link to see progress in real-time

deployment.title: Deployment
paragraphs: I handle everything needed to get your site live—setting up hosting, connecting your domain, ensuring it's fast and secure, and testing that it works perfectly across all devices.

postDeployment.title: Post-Deployment
paragraphs: Once your site is live, I'll show you how to update content yourself. I'm also available for ongoing support—whether you need help with changes, fixes, or want to add new features.
bulletPoints: Training on how to update content
Ongoing support when you need it

howIPrice.label: Pricing
howIPrice.headline: How I Price
howIPrice.subtitle: Transparent pricing that scales with your needs.
howIPrice.intro: Most websites are slow, hard to edit, or break easily. I build modern websites that are designed to load instantly, rank well on Google, and—most importantly—allow you to edit the text and images yourself without needing to call me every time.

packages.title: Project Packages
packages.subtitle: Select the option that matches where your business is today.

launch.title: The "Launch" Package
launch.bestFor: Best for: Startups, Consultants, or New Product Launches.
launch.description: This is your digital business card. It is designed to make a strong first impression and capture leads.
features: Custom Design: A unique look that matches your brand (no generic templates).
Mobile Perfect: Looks great on phones, tablets, and desktops.
Easy Editing: A simple dashboard where you can change text and images.
Google-Ready: Setup so search engines can find you.
Speed Optimized: Loads fast so visitors don't leave.
Simple Analytics: Basic page views tracking to see how many visitors you get.

growth.title: The "Growth" Package
growth.bestFor: Best for: Established businesses needing a full professional presence.
growth.description: A full website system that helps you sell your services and builds trust with customers.
features: Full Website Structure: 3–7 pages (Home, About, Services, Contact, etc.).
Advanced Editor: You get full control over your content, blog posts, and pages.
Lead Generation: Connected to your email or CRM (e.g., leads go straight to your inbox).
Scalable: Built so we can easily add new pages later without rebuilding the whole site.
Top-Tier Speed: Optimized to pass Google's strict speed requirements.
Multi-Language Setup: Localization included and configured from the start (ready for 2+ languages).
Basic Booking System: Simple appointment or reservation functionality built in.
Analytics Integration: Full tracking setup to understand where your visitors come from and what they do.

custom.title: Custom Solutions
custom.bestFor: Best for: Businesses with specific, complex needs.
custom.description: Do you need customers to log in? Do you need a complex booking system or a custom internal tool? We can build that.

addOns.title: Optional Upgrades (Add-Ons)
addOns.subtitle: Specific features you might need to reach your goals.

seo.title: SEO Boost
seo.benefit: I dig deeper into the technical settings to help you rank higher on Google.

store.title: Online Store
store.benefit: Ability to sell products and accept credit cards securely.

multiLanguage.title: Multi-Language
multiLanguage.benefit: A site that works in 2+ languages (e.g., English & Spanish).

analytics.title: Analytics Pro
analytics.benefit: I set up tracking so you can see exactly where your visitors come from.

cert-1.description:
FreeCodeCamp certificate for Responsive Design representing approximately 300 hours of coursework.

Key concepts:
- Flexbox and Grid
- Mobile-first / desktop-first design
- Responsive design using media queries
- Accessibility and best practices

cert-2.description:
FreeCodeCamp certificate for Javascript Algorithms and Data Structures representing approximately 300 hours of coursework.

Key concepts:
- Learned JavaScript with the latest version ECMAScript 2021
- Data structures and algorithms
- Testing and debugging
- Functional programming

cert-4.description:
A 48-hour course on React and how to build fully-fledged SPAs.

Key concepts:
- Design independent and reusable components
- Creating custom React Hooks
- Styled Components and CSS Modules
- Using React with Redux as a state management
- NextJS and TypeScript

cert-5.description:
My first course where I learned the basic of web development.

Key concepts:
- Semantic and responsive design with **HTML** and **CSS**
- Interactive pages and calling **APIs** asynchronously using **JavaScript**.
- Coding a web server using **ExpressJS**, **MongoDB** and **MySQL**
- Authentication, cookies, authorization, sessions
- Common security issues and how to avoid them

job-1.description:
- Completed a three-month internship, working on a project to create an internal web page for employees to request items from company warehouses.
- Accessed inventory database, monitored stock levels, and managed requests using established microservices.
- Learned and applied the Kendo UI library, following the project's coding and design guidelines.
- Implemented authentication and authorization features on the front-end, ensuring user privacy for request history and ongoing requests.

job-2.description:
- Worked closely with designers and product managers to bring design into high quality and production-ready features
- Developed reusable components that integrate with Headless CMS which made independent page building possible.
- Implemented Storybook into the codebase for better development and having a single source of truth
- Worked with latest React tools and features (ESNext, React functional components, hooks, Webpack, Vite, etc.)

faq.label: FAQ
faq.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about my services, process, and how we can work together.

faq-1.question: How long does a typical project take?
faq-1.answer: Project timelines vary based on scope and complexity. A simple landing page typically takes 1-2 weeks, while a full website with multiple pages can take 2-4 weeks. Custom solutions with complex functionality may take longer. I'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.

faq-2.question: Do you work with clients outside your timezone?
faq-2.answer: Yes, I work with clients globally. I'm flexible with communication times and can accommodate different timezones. Most communication happens asynchronously via email and project management tools, with scheduled calls when needed.

faq-3.question: What happens after the project is completed?
faq-3.answer: After launch, I provide training on how to manage your content through the CMS. I also offer ongoing maintenance and support options to keep your site running smoothly. You'll have full ownership of your code and can choose to maintain it yourself or continue working with me.

faq-4.question: Can you work with my existing website?
faq-4.answer: Absolutely. I can improve, redesign, or add features to existing websites. Whether you need performance optimization, a fresh design, or new functionality, I can work with your current setup and help take it to the next level.

faq-5.question: What's included in your pricing packages?
faq-5.answer: Each package includes custom design, mobile responsiveness, content management system access, SEO setup, and performance optimization. Higher-tier packages include more pages, advanced features, and additional integrations. All packages come with training and documentation. See the <link>How I Price</link> section for detailed breakdowns.
